import React from 'react'; import Navbar from './Navbar'; import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { createSettings, editSettings } from '../actions/settings'; function Settings({ settings, currentSettingId, setCurrentSettingId }) { //set variables const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('profile')); var w = window.innerWidth; const dispatch = useDispatch(); //get current user's settings const thisUsersSettings = settings.filter( (s) => user?.result?.googleId === s?.userId || user?.result?._id === s?.userId, ); const saveSettings = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (currentSettingId === 0) { dispatch(createSettings({})); } else { dispatch(editSettings(currentSettingId, {})); } }; console.log(settings); console.log(thisUsersSettings); //populate text area with current settings if they exist return ( <> {w > 480 ? (
